title: Why can't I see some application icons on the home screen?
answer: [You may have placed the application icons in a folder. After the applications are updated, their icons remain in that folder instead of the home screen. You can search for the applications in the folders on the home screen, for example, Facebook is placed in the folder Top Apps. You can also use the quick search feature on the home screen to invoke the application: Swipe down from the center of the home screen and enter the application name in the search box.]()
